title: On the Edge of Dreams and Nightmares
description: There's nothing like murder to bring two people close.Nigel Thomas is a successful artist who enjoys a well-ordered London life. Things change when the noted actress Ligeia Gordon commissions a portrait. During the sittings, she reveals that they had met thirty years earlier when their lives were very different. Using this distant connection, Ligeia subtly exploits that connection until their lives inextricably bound with secrets, madness, and murder.
author: Michael Reidy
